architecture_overview: Ray is a distributed computing framework with a modular architecture comprising a frontend for job submission, a backend for task scheduling, a storage layer for data persistence, and worker nodes for distributed execution.

components.name: Frontend
components.description: Handles user interaction and job submission interfaces.

components.name: Backend
components.description: Manages task scheduling, resource allocation, and coordination across nodes.

components.name: Storage
components.description: Provides persistent storage for intermediate data and results.

components.name: Worker Nodes
components.description: Distributed compute nodes executing tasks in parallel.
